DLC for FaceWorld Pro
Support body motion capture, five-finger motion capture of both hands.
1. No need for body labeling. Ordinary users can use it out of the box to obtain excellent body motion capture effect.
2. Support high-performance identification of different light sources, only CPU and no high-performance graphics card are required.
3. It is recommended that users use a wide-angle camera and wear close-fitting or tight-fitting clothing for better motion capture.
4. Suitable for live broadcast, education, conferences and other applications.
5. Support users to use custom 3D models (VRM format)
